pages.text: The blaze is a... creature, if one can call them that - found in the fortresses of the nether. It is a floating, corporeal head with several rods rapidly orbiting its center of gravity, seeming to be stabilizers for its highly volatile form; so volatile, in fact, that it simply explodes when killed. $(br2)It lobs a volley of high

velocity fireballs against anything it perceives as a threat. I hestitate to call it a creature, because it certainly does not seem to be any naturally born thing; its strained mechanical breathing and highly unusual anatomy makes me suspect it may have been some sort of automaton, created for the purpose of defense. $(br2)Nonetheless, when killed they may sometimes drop one of their stabilizing
rods, useful for many other purposes.
